get.description: Returns a list of backups from a location.

parameters.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

encryptionCertThumbprint.description: The thumbprint of the certificate used to encrypt the backup encryption key.

stampVersion.description: Azure Stack stamp version of the backup.
